text: Freshers is a reality documentary series that airs on ITV2. The series follows a group of freshers in their early days at university, showing how they adapt to life away from home, making friends and studying. The first series was filmed in 2013 at the University of Bedfordshire and its success led ITV to renew it for a second series. The follow up series was filmed at Swansea University in Wales at the start of the 2014-15 academic year. ==References== ==External links== *Freshers on ITV Player *Mentorn Media website Category:2013 British television series debuts Category:2010s British reality television series Category:ITV reality television shows Category:British college television series Category:British documentary television series Category:Swansea University Category:University of Bedfordshire
title: Freshers (TV series)
